tosdr.case: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision

title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
quoteText: Riot Gamesâ€™ failure to enforce any provision of these Terms shall in no way be construed to be a present or future waiver of such provision, nor in any way affect the right of any party to enforce each and every such provision after that.
